scripts.transpile: npm run transpile:moment && npm run transpile:options
scripts.build: npm run transpile && npm run copy && web-ext build --source-dir=build --overwrite-dest
scripts.test: concurrently "npm run copy:watch" "npm run transpile:moment -- -w"  "npm run transpile:options -- -w" "npm run web-ext:run" --kill-others
scripts.test:fr: concurrently "npm run copy:watch" "npm run transpile:moment -- -w"  "npm run transpile:options -- -w" "npm run web-ext:run -- --pref intl.accept_languages=fr-fr" --kill-others
